Name: The Mermaid's Secret Remedy The Love Spell
About the game: Fixed text box design to improve character recognition rate in OCR translation. ******* Lysia, a stupid mermaid with a past helped by a prince while drowning in the sea. However, she heard that the 'prince' was lying sick, and she jumped out of the sea, no matter where she was. He lost his voice and took his feet to deliver the 'Princess Mermaid' to the Prince. I met Eddie, a childhood friend and gardener. Eugene is a quiet but kind knight. And the prince who has been longing for-Gilbert. Licia, who was determined to work as a pharmacist at Ojo, due to the prince. As she lives in the Royal Palace, she finds her sweet and bitter “first love”. -The Little Mermaid does not become a bubble. To make sure you have a happy ending. The player becomes the main character and chooses his own destiny. Bring happiness to his beloved and many people. Visual Novel. ******* This work contains elements of sexual activity, sex without consent. Contains nudity or sexual content. Contains sexually explicit or sexually explicit material. ******* How can I set my system locale to Japanese? /
